1 loss out of 7 games could imply 6 wins out of 7 games, as long as the only outcomes are win and lose. However, based on my research, a draw is also possible:

"A draw happens when both teams finish the game with the same number of goals at the end of regulation time, typically 90 minutes. In the league structure, both teams would earn one point each for a draw, unlike a win where the winning team earns three points and the losing team earns none."

Which means that 1 loss does not imply 6 wins.
